New Records: Quentin Grimes scored 20 points in the third quarter, the most he has scored in any quarter in his career, surpassing his previous high of 19 points.
Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes scored 17 straight points for Dallas at one point during the third quarter and the start of the fourth quarter.
Quentin Grimes was responsible for 28 of the Mavericks' 32 third-quarter points.
